Declaration of consent acc­ording to GDPR
We will treat the an­swers to this online survey strictly confidential, GDPR-compliant and only use them in anonymous or aggregated form. We will pass on your an­swers to the questions within the ZEW Private Debt Survey to our cooperation partner Prime Capital AG in an aggregated and anonymous form. In the imprint you find extensive in­for­ma­tion on data protection.
I hereby consent to my collected data being used for the ZEW Private Debt Survey.
Declaration of consent to forward an­swers in non-anonymized form to Prime Capital AG:

I hereby agree that the an­swers I have given as part of the ZEW Private Debt Survey will be passed on to Prime Capital AG in non-anonymized form. No personal data is passed on to Prime Capital AG, only the company name and the an­swers given in the survey. Prime Capital AG will not pass on the data received and will only process this data within the scope of the busi­ness activities of the In­vest­ment Advisory & Solutions division, in particular for the purposes of database enrichment in the context of manager selection or for the purpose of deriving capital market assumptions.
I do not agree with my data being forwarded to Prime Capital AG in non-anonymized form.

label.de: Fragebogen abschließen um die Da­ten final zu speichern.
label.en: Finish this survey and finalize your an­swers.
